column4: anyone have a quick minute for newb question about wifi and ubuntu?

Do any wireless devices work with Ubuntu "out of the box"?  Is there a list of these devices or drivers somewhere? I have a desktop that I intend to use with Ubuntu and thought I would ask before I go out and buy an 802.11 adapter.
Anyone have any luck with the Linksys USB 2.0 802.11 adapters?
I got a trendnet to work, but it was so long ago i forget ho wi did it :-(
